issue.title: ArithmeticLike should have construction from an unsigned integral type

discussion.p: It is necessary to add the associated c'tor signature T::T(uintmax_t) to concept ArithmeticLike as well, because otherwise uintmax_t itself would be excluded and ArithmeticLike itself is not restricted on signed types (uintmax_t -> intmax_t can lead to overflow), e.g HasNegate > is part of all arithmetic types.

resolution.p: Add the following to concept ArithmeticLike:
